page.title: 17KILLIGREW SCHOOLS
page.content: There are two schools sharing the same site in{Chiswell Green.}One caters for aged 5-7 children and the other is the junior section for children up to 11 years. The name of{'Killigrew'}was adopted when a combined school moved from St.Stephens church hall to a new site in Chiswell Green. Admiral Killigrew had been a resident in the area in the past although the family moved to Devon and formed much stronger connections there. There is an active{parents association}which raises funds for both schools through a variety of social events to appeal to both children and adults alike.In past years they have provided the money for an open air{swimming pool}in the school grounds which is in constant use during the holiday when it remains open for family use.
